alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 30 at 3:20PM EDT until May 02 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations ranging from a couple inches near the lakeshore up to 12 inches along the higher terrain of the Keweenaw. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning and Monday evening commutes. With heavy wet snow collecting on trees and powerlines, the stronger winds late tonight and Monday may cause tree damage and power outages. The wet, heavy snow will also be difficult to move.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
